cta.finePrint: 14-day trial • Cancel anytime • No setup fees

items.question: How does the free trial work?
items.answer: You get full access to all features for 14 days. No credit card required. You can cancel anytime during the trial period.

items.question: Can I change plans anytime?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR, SOC 2, and other industry standards.

items.question: What integrations do you support?
items.answer: We support 50+ integrations including Slack, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, GitHub, Jira, and many more.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans if you're not satisfied.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Billing is simple. We charge monthly or yearly based on your plan. You can manage your billing directly from your account settings.
